WITH DOMAINCHAIN AS (SELECT * FROM CAP_BIZ_DOMAIN S CONNECT BY PRIOR S.ID = S.PARENT_ID START WITH S.ID = #{domainId})
SELECT T1.ID id, T1.DOMAIN_ID domainId, T1.SORT_NO sortNo, T1.CODE code, T1.NAME name, T1.DATA_FROM dataFrom, T1.DOCUMENT_ID documentId, T1.PACKAGE_ID packageId, T3.NAME packageName, T1.PACKAGE_FLAG packageFlag, '0' newData, T1.DESCRIPTION description FROM CAP_BIZ_OBJ_INFO T1,CAP_BIZ_OBJ_INFO T3
,DOMAINCHAIN T2
WHERE T1.PACKAGE_ID=T3.ID(+)
AND T1.DOMAIN_ID = T2.ID
AND (T1.PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId})
ORDER BY T1.SORT_NO ASC
